payload.rawSql:
INSERT INTO
  `db-teg-test1`.clients (name, telegram_group, status)
VALUES
  (
    '${payload.name}',
    '${payload.telegram_group}',
    CASE
      WHEN '${payload.status}' = 'true' THEN 1
      ELSE 0
    END
  );

UPDATE `db-teg-test1`.clients
SET name = '${payload.name}',
    telegram_group = '${payload.telegram_group}',
    status = CASE WHEN '${payload.status}' = 'true' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END
WHERE id = '${payload.id}';

INSERT INTO
  `db-teg-test1`.locations (name, client_id, address, status)
values
  (
    '${payload.name}',
    '${payload.client_name}',
    '${payload.address}',
    CASE
      WHEN '${payload.status}' = 'true' THEN 1
      ELSE 0
    END
  );

UPDATE `db-teg-test1`.locations
SET name = '${payload.name}',
    client_id = '${payload.client_name}',
    address = '${payload.address}',
    status = case when '${payload.status}' = 'true' then 1 else 0 end
WHERE id = '${payload.id}';

INSERT INTO
  `db-teg-test1`.variables (name, unit, status)
values
  (
    '${payload.name}',
    '${payload.unit}',
    CASE
      WHEN '${payload.status}' = 'true' THEN 1
      ELSE 0
    END
  );

UPDATE `db-teg-test1`.variables
SET name = '${payload.name}',
    unit = '${payload.unit}',
    status = case when '${payload.status}' = 'true' then 1 else 0 end
WHERE id = '${payload.id}';

INSERT INTO
  `db-teg-test1`.users (name, client_id, email, phone, enable_notifications, status)
values
  (
    '${payload.name}',
    '${payload.client_name}',
    '${payload.email}',
    '${payload.phone}',
    '${payload.enable_notifications}',
    CASE
      WHEN '${payload.status}' = 'true' THEN 1
      ELSE 0
    END
  );

items.columnTooltip: Notifications enabled for Telegram, MSM, Email
items.label: notify

payload.rawSql:
UPDATE `db-teg-test1`.users
SET name = '${payload.name}',
    client_id = '${payload.client_name}',
    email = '${payload.email}',
    phone = '${payload.phone}',
    enable_notifications = '${payload.enable_notifications}',
    status = case when '${payload.status}' = 'true' then 1 else 0 end
WHERE id = '${payload.id}';

items.columnTooltip: Unique sensor identifier. If the sensor is obtained via a Modbus master, combine the MAC address and the request ByteArray, separated by '@'. E.g., '<MAC>@<ByteArrayRequest>'

payload.rawSql:
UPDATE `db-teg-test1`.sensors
SET name = '${payload.name}',
    serial = '${payload.serial}',
    description = '${payload.description}'
WHERE id = '${payload.id}';

INSERT INTO
  `db-teg-test1`.devices (client_id, mac_address, model, status)
values
  (
    '${payload.client_name}',
    '${payload.mac_address}',
    '${payload.model}',
    CASE
      WHEN '${payload.status}' = 'true' THEN 1
      ELSE 0
    END
  );

UPDATE `db-teg-test1`.devices
SET client_id = '${payload.client_name}',
    mac_address = '${payload.mac_address}',
    model = '${payload.model}',
    status = case when '${payload.status}' = 'true' then 1 else 0 end
WHERE id = '${payload.id}';

targets.rawSql:
SELECT dv.*, c.name AS client_name
FROM `db-teg-test1`.devices dv
INNER JOIN `db-teg-test1`.clients c
ON dv.client_id = c.id
order by id;
